111. But as Jesus Christ in this passage is speaking only of private faults‚ it is necessary to make this distinction—that some sins are private, and others public or notorious. With respect to the former, Christ says to every private individual, “Tell him his fault between thee and him alone.'' For when Peter committed a public offence, he did not admonish him iu private, bnt brought him forward before all the Church.
